English(en): Imp
The air around you smells of sulphur. An Imp approaches!
Portuguese(pt): O ar à sua volta fede a enxofre. Um Diabrete se aproxima!

English(en): The imp attempts to scratch you, but you sidestep it without breaking a sweat.
Portuguese(pt): O diabrete tenta te arranhar, mas você desvia dele sem dificuldade.

English(en): The imp throws itself at your shins, tripping you over for $dmg damage.
Portuguese(pt): O diabrete se joga nas suas canelas, te derrubando por $dmg de dano.

English(en): The imp's scrapes you with gross fingernails, for $dmg damage.
Portuguese(pt): O diabrete te arranha com unhas nojentas, causando $dmg de dano.

English(en): Rentaur
The rumble of hooves reaches you across the plains. A Rentaur approaches!
The rentaur attempts to gore you with its horns, but you swiftly dodge out of the way.
The rentaur kicks you in the chest, and you gasp for air. $dmg damage!
The rentaur slices at you with razor-sharp horns for $dmg damage!
Mechanical Sentry
You hear the whirring of gears and the scraping of metal. A mechanical sentry pops up!
The sentry spins its blade around, but you're well out of range.
You don't expect the sentry to move so quickly, and it slices you for $dmg damage.
The sentry ejects a blast of steam at you, scalding your skin. You take $dmg damage.
Hall Monitor
A large lizard slithers toward you before standing up and flexing its scales.
The big reptile misses you by inches, hissing in frustration.
You dodge the tail swipe, but aren't fast enough to dodge the bite that follows. $dmg damage!
The big lizard bounces directly into you, squashing you into the cold floor for $dmg damage.
Merman
A fin darts through the water towards you, scaly limbs exploding out of the water. A merman approaches!
You dodge out of the swipe at the last minute, a fleshy fin slapping softly against your armor.
The merman disappears underwater and slashes at you from below, catching you in full for $dmg damage.
The merman spits at you, hitting you in the face, and for some reason it burns fiercely. $dmg damage.
Water Elemental
A magicked orb emerges from the water, orbited by liquid and aggression. A water elemental!
The elemental almost drags you underwater, but you kick out of the way.
The elemental punches you in the chest with fists of water. You don't expect it to hit so hard. $dmg damage.
You're hit with a blindingly fast glob of water that deals $dmg damage and knocks you off-center.
God of Wishes
At an altar in the distance, a presence floats within a cocoon of metal and death. Your wishes will come at a cost.
The laser hisses at you, shaving an inch of your hair and nearly blinding you.
You're hit by a scalding blast of amaranth light. $dmg damage.
The laser cuts through your skin like a fine razor, and you agonize. $dmg damage.
